deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text: @dev Keep OrganType consistent with Donor/Recipient contracts

@notice Lightweight info struct (returnable) for a hospital
 @dev Avoid mappings in the returned struct for ABI-compatibility

@notice Optional location struct for future extensibility
 @dev Included to mirror patterns used in Recipient.sol (if any)
@notice Restrict to staff with any role except None for a given hospital
@notice Restrict to Admin for a given hospital (or contract owner)

@notice Verify hospital credentials; stores a hash and flips isVerified.
 @dev Only owner can verify. Credentials can be any byte payload; we store keccak256.
@notice Get hospital info (name, location, licenseId, isVerified)

@notice Update organ capacity for a hospital
 @dev Allowed for Admin or Coordinator of that hospital, or the contract owner.

@notice Authorize a new staff member or change role for existing staff.
 @dev Only a Hospital Admin (or contract owner) can call. Setting Role.None removes permissions.
@notice Convenience getter for a staff member's role at a hospital
@notice Read capacity for a given organ at a hospital
@notice Optional: owner can update core info fields (e.g., name/location/license changes)

devdoc.details: Designed for Truffle + MetaMask deployments; no external dependencies.

authorizeHospitalStaff(address,address,u.details: Only a Hospital Admin (or contract owner) can call. Setting Role.None removes permissions.

registerHospital(address,(string,string,.details: Only owner can register to keep the registry curated & sybil-resistant.

params.hospitalAddress: EOA or contract representing the institution.
params.hospitalInfo: Basic info (name/location/licenseId). isVerified is forced false at registration.

updateHospitalCapacity(address,uint8,uin.details: Allowed for Admin or Coordinator of that hospital, or the contract owner.

verifyHospitalCredentials(address,bytes).details: Only owner can verify. Credentials can be any byte payload; we store keccak256.

devdoc.title: Hospital / Institution Management for Global NFT-Based Organ Donation System

authorizeHospitalStaff(address,address,u.notice: Authorize a new staff member or change role for existing staff.

getHospitalCapacity(address,uint8).notice: Read capacity for a given organ at a hospital

getHospitalInfo(address).notice: Get hospital info (name, location, licenseId, isVerified)

getStaffRole(address,address).notice: Convenience getter for a staff member's role at a hospital

registerHospital(address,(string,string,.notice: Register a hospital/institution into the registry.

updateHospitalCapacity(address,uint8,uin.notice: Update organ capacity for a hospital

updateHospitalCoreInfo(address,string,st.notice: Optional: owner can update core info fields (e.g., name/location/license changes)

verifyHospitalCredentials(address,bytes).notice: Verify hospital credentials; stores a hash and flips isVerified.

userdoc.notice: Follows the same owner/modifier/event-driven pattern as Donor.sol and Recipient.sol
